languages.text: "Мы, слуги Императора, должны помочь друг другу в этом опасном месте!"
"We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."
languages.original_text: "Мы, слуги Императора, должны помочь друг другу в этом опасном месте!"

traits.locale_text: "We humans ought to help each other in this perilous place."
"We humans ought to help each other in this perilous place."
"We humans ought to help each other in this perilous place."
"We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in perilous place."

languages.text: “我们都是帝皇的仆人，身处这种危险的地方，理当互相帮助。”
languages.original_text: "We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."

traits.locale_text: “在这种危机四伏的地方，我们人类应该互相帮助。”
“我们都是帝皇的仆人，身处这种危险的地方，理当互相帮助。”

languages.text: 「我々はどちらも皇帝のしもべだ、危険な場所では手を取り合ったほうがいい」
languages.original_text: "We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."

traits.locale_text: 「我々はどちらも皇帝のしもべだ、危険な場所では手を取り合ったほうがいい」

languages.text: «Ambos somos sirvientes del Emperador y, por tanto, deberíamos ayudarnos mutuamente en un lugar tan peligroso».
languages.original_text: "We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."

traits.locale_text: «Ambos somos sirvientes del Emperador y, por tanto, deberíamos ayudarnos mutuamente en un lugar tan peligroso».

languages.text: « Nous sommes tous les deux des serviteurs de l'Empereur. Nous devrions nous entraider dans cet endroit si périlleux. »
languages.original_text: "We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."

traits.locale_text: « Les humains doivent se serrer les coudes dans un lieu pareil. »
« Nous sommes tous les deux des serviteurs de l'Empereur. Nous devrions nous entraider dans cet endroit si périlleux. »

languages.text: "Wir dienen beide dem Imperator und sollten einander an diesem gefährlichen Ort helfen."
languages.original_text: "We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."

traits.locale_text: "Wir dienen beide dem Imperator und sollten einander an diesem gefährlichen Ort helfen."

languages.text: "İkimiz de İmparator'un hizmetkârlarıyız. Bu tehlikeli bir yerde birbirimize yardım etmeliyiz."
languages.original_text: "We are both servants of the Emperor, we ought to help each other in this perilous place."

traits.locale_text: "İkimiz de İmparator'un hizmetkârlarıyız. Bu tehlikeli bir yerde birbirimize yardım etmeliyiz."
"İkimiz de İmparator'un hizmetkârlarıyız. Böylesi tehlikeli bir yerde birbirimize yardım etmeliyiz."
